plot: A young man working to save enough money for college gets caught up in a dangerous prescription drug scene when he becomes involved with a wealthy girl with too much time and money on her hands.
title: Heaven Burns
plot_es: A young man working to save enough money for college gets caught up in a dangerous prescription drug scene when he becomes involved with a wealthy girl with too much time and money on her hands.
plot_en: A young man working to save enough money for college gets caught up in a dangerous prescription drug scene when he becomes involved with a wealthy girl with too much time and money on her hands.
